ca.gedge.opgraph
Interface OpNodeListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
OpNodeAdapter
public interface OpNodeListener

A listener for OpNode.

Method Summary

          Called when an input field was added to a node.

nodePropertyChanged

void nodePropertyChanged(String propertyName,
                         Object oldValue,
                         Object newValue)
Called when a basic property is changed on the node.

Parameters:
propertyName - the name of the property
oldValue - the old value of the property
newValue - the new value of the property

fieldAdded

void fieldAdded(OpNode node,
                InputField field)
Called when an input field was added to a node.

Parameters:
node - the source node to which the input field was added
field - the input field that was added

                  InputField field)
Called when an input field was removed from a node.

Parameters:
node - the source node from which the input field was removed
field - the input field that was removed
